Its 119 rooms and suites are free from single-use plastic and are ideal for rest or work if you wish. You will find in each of them a renovated, bright and comfortable space. And as if that wasn't enough, try our restaurant Cas Menestral, where sustainably sourced fish is on the menu and breakfast overlooking Plaza Catalunya, will be a real treat for foodies. The hotel rooftop terrace offers spectacular views of the city, also a meeting room, a stylish rooftop pool, room service, and parking facilities. Don't forget for those of you travelling with special guests, our hotel is pet friendly on request.

At the hotel, each room is equipped with a wardrobe. At River Garden Hotel + Suites each room comes with a desk and a private bathroom. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or a buffet breakfast. River Garden Hotel + Suites offers a hot tub. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Saint Francis Church, Artisan Market Guayaquil and Botanical Garden. The nearest airport is José Joaquín de Olmedo International, 4 km from River Garden Hotel + Suites. The hotel offers in-out airport transportation as long as you request in advance.

As your “home away from home,” the hotel rooms offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, mini-fridge, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available. Dotted among the tropical gardens—open-air cafes, small pool enclaves and fresh fruit oases are yours to discover. Never crowded or hurried, the resort offers an intimate tranquility and when desired, total seclusion. All rooms embrace a quiet elegance with island cedar furnishings and pure white linens. Plantation shutters open onto private verandahs with views of gardens and azure sea. Breezy open-air restaurants engage candle-lit lanterns and billowing white curtains to strike a romantic note. While the pristine 10-acre sports complex encompasses every imaginable activity, the superb spa serves as a haven of relaxation. Couples Swept Away simply captures your heart and soothes your soul.

descripcion: Finding a perfect and luxury hotel in Sorrento it is easy, welcome to the Grand Hotel La Favorita, a great option for travellers like you. Located in the historical centre of Sorrento, you are able to explore “the Cloister of San Francesco, the Cathedral of San Filippo and Giacomo, Tasso Square and the Vallone dei mulini”, all of them are at walking distance from the hotel. Our 24/7 reception staff and concierge will be glad to help you to arrange for any kind of reservations and excursions around Sorrento and its surroundings. All the rooms are accessible with an elevator and they provide a smart TV, AC unit, safe deposit, minibar, set of tea and coffee facilities. Every guest is able to access our free Wi-Fi, gym and pool which is located at the hotel rooftop terrace with a wonderful sea view of the Gulf of Naples. On the rooftop terrace we also have our "Bellavista Cocktail Bar" with live music and a great restaurant serving superb local food and drinks for our guests. If you would like to eat out in town you can always reserve a table at the "Ristorante O’Parrucchiano" with its private and romantic lemon garden. We also provide a private parking for our guests. The Grand Hotel La Favorita can’t wait to welcome you for your next vacation in Sorrento.

descripcion: A beloved landmark dating back to 1904, Fairmont The Norfolk has played a pivotal role in Kenya’s historical legacy notably as the town and later the modern city of Nairobi grew around the property. A hidden gem with alluring old-world charm and elegant contemporary design, Fairmont The Norfolk offers guests a sophisticated retreat in the city with easy access to key business districts of Gigiri, Westlands and Upperhill in addition to leisure hubs and the bourgeoning Nairobi art scene. The hotel boasts 17 luxurious suites and 108 rooms set around tranquil tropical gardens, a heated outdoor swimming pool and a health club with a fitness centre and intimate spa facilities. The rooms combine classic elegance and modern design with discreet technology. Many rooms offer breathtaking elevated views of the landscaped courtyard, while the signature suites are an excellent choice for guests seeking to experience luxury intertwined with the rich history of the city.

nombre: Great Northern Hotel, A Tribute Portfolio Hotel, London
descripcion: One of London's finest luxury hotels just 25 metres from Eurostar at St Pancras International and actually within Kings Cross Station, offering a 24 hour front desk, free Wi-Fi and a complimentary comprehensive in-room entertainment package. Befitting the GNH's rich architectural heritage, the hotel's bedrooms have been sensitively restored with a design that exudes elegance and grace. Free from unnecessary clutter, the rooms are expertly proportioned, with high ceilings and an abundance of natural light through large 'six-over-six' slash windows. Walls, floors, ceilings and windows are acoustically lined, creating a peaceful cocoon. The mechanical and electrically systems are state of the art, furniture is bespoke designed and hand crafted by Italian and British artisans, and only the very best fixtures and fittings have been used - Loewe LCD HD televisions, top of the range Hypnos beds and Lefroy Brooks bathroom furniture. The hotel is home to one of London's finest destination restaurants, RAILS Restaurant & Little Bar, whilst on the ground floor sits GNH Bar and Terrace a destination cocktail bar, with a stunning interior serving the very best food, champagne and cocktails.

Explore our city by hopping on Fort Lauderdale’s complimentary Sun Trolley located just steps from the Hotel. Ride to enjoy our beautiful beaches, the upscale Galleria Mall or to dine and shop on trendy Las Olas Boulevard. A unique way to experience our city known as the “Venice of America” is by taking a quick walk and jumping on the Water Taxi where you can cruise the Intracoastal Waterway. Be sure to enjoy a cup of locally roasted La Colombe coffee before you head out. Come back and sip a specialty cocktail or try a local craft beer in R Lounge or savor a locally inspired specialty in Bistro 17. At Renaissance we believe you should experience your journey like a local!

descripcion: Lindos Royal hotel is a fascinating picture of classic Rhodes colonial style architecture, a host of columns and spectacular arches make up the extravagant exterior. Luxury 5 star accommodation centered around style and indulgence. The inviting rooms at the Lindos Royal accommodate your every need, preference and budget. Each room, from our standard and comfort rooms to our sumptuous suites are spacious, quiet and superbly appointed. At San Francisco North/Petaluma RV & Camping Resort we offer all styles of camping, from Mega RV, travel trailer, camping cabins, Wine Country Tiny Houses to tenting. We are a full service resort with a beautiful pool & Spa area, 2 stores, seasonal foodservice, special events. Bocce Ball, Horseshoe pits, Corn Hole, Off leash Dog Park, Bounce Pillow, Mining Camp, Rock Wall and Petting Farm. Our full recreation program operates from Memorial Day to Labor Day. Every weekend in October offers a full recreation spooktacular event with site decorating, hayrides, parades and trick or treating. As an added bonus we are located across the street from the Petaluma Pumpkin patch and massive corn maze. Our Wine Country Lodges and Studio lodges are individual units with private bedroom, bathroom, outdoor sitting areas, picnic table, gas bbq, firepit and full kitchen or kitchenette. Come enjoy the outdoors without having to pack your camping gear. We offer glamping in the heart of the Wine Country. We are a short trip to San Francisco, Coastal Beaches, Graton Rancheria Casino, Sonoma Raceway, Six Flags Discovery Kingdom, Petaluma Premium Outlet shopping, Lagunitas Brewery, many golf courses and more wineries than you can count! We offer all types of accommodations at our beautiful glam camping resort from tenting, cabins, RV sites to full service glam camping in our Wine Country Lodges. Wine Country lodges offer all the comfort of a hotel without having to meet your neighbors in the hallway. San Francisco North/Petaluma RV & Camping Resort has been family run for family fun for 3 generations by the Wood family. We are celebrating our 50th year of making fantastic camping memories with our guests.

Our hotel is less than half a mile from the Dallas Medical District, which features many top hospitals including Children's Medical, Scottish Rite, UT Southwestern and Baylor Medical Center. Each of our refined suites includes separate living and sleeping areas, high-speed Internet, mini-refrigerators and 42-inch TVs. We look forward to welcoming you to Dallas.

descripcion: Located in the heart of the vibrant River North district, Kinzie Hotel embodies the adventurous spirit of Chicago. Named after the renowned Chicago settler and silversmith, John Kinzie, the history and culture of this exciting city unfolds at our doorstep, waiting to be discovered. Boasting a central location near Michigan Avenue and the Loop, this contemporary Chicago boutique hotel is a sophisticated downtown escape for both business and leisure travelers. Whether your interests are arts, dining, shopping, or nightlife, our ideal location easily allows you to embark on an urban exploration of Chicago. Chic, comfortable accommodations feature Chicago-inspired design elements and luxurious amenities, including rejuvenating H2O Plus Spa products and Keurig coffeemakers. Enjoy our continental breakfast, conveniently served on each floor just steps from your guest room. Every evening from 5pm - 8pm, guests are welcome to unwind during our nightly reception in the Double Cross Lounge. Each guest will receive one complimentary drink per night and can enjoy an assortment of hors d'oeuvres. Stay connected with lightning-fast WiFi throughout the hotel or by visiting our 24-hour business center. Keep up with your workout schedule in a well-equipped 24-hour fitness center, featuring state-of-the-art equipment, free weights, Yoga/Pilates mats, and more. At Kinzie Hotel, you'll experience Chicago like you never have before.

descripcion: Want to get to know the real Portland? The keeping weird, coffee-drinking, food-loving, creative, always-outdoors, never normal Portland? We're Hotel Lucia, and we know Portland. Because we are Portland. Centrally located in the heart of downtown close to dining, shopping, entertainment, public transit, and more, Hotel Lucia is the perfect starting point for your Portland adventures. Why? From our hotel artwork to the experts at our 24-hr front desk and concierge service, everything about us is local. We’ve been helping people discover and fall in love with this city since before Portland was trendy, and we’ll keep on doing it for everyone from leisure travelers to business travelers and everyone in between. Some of Portland’s best landmarks and local attractions, dining, and restaurants can be found just steps from Hotel Lucia. Browse books at the world-famous Powell’s City of Books or shop famous brands from Nike to Louis Vuitton in and around the Pioneer Square Mall. Stop in for a cup of Portland-roasted joe at Never Coffee, dine at the world's first certified sustainable sushi restaurant Bamboo Sushi, or try craft cocktails (a Portland specialty) at Fortune. The nearby Pioneer Square and Courthouse is the perfect starting point to discovering Portland; known as the city’s living room, it’s here that Portlanders come to hang out, have fun, and enjoy the feel of the city. From there, TriMet buses and MAX Light Rail lines can connect you to the rest of Portland, from the hip Pearl District to Chinatown to Forest Park. Then, after long days exploring, we’ve got everything you need to rest, recover, and get ready for the next day. Our boutique rooms come with fine modern amenities including a flat screen TV, air conditioning, free Wi-Fi, and a minibar. Want to get in a workout? Head to our top-line fitness center. Need a place to park your car? Enjoy convenient paid public parking on-site or use our valet service. 24-hour room service is also available from Cheryl’s restaurant. So come and stay with us. We know Portland and we’re here to help you discover her.

descripcion: EcoCamp is situated in the very heart of Torres del Paine National Park and provides the region’s first fully sustainable accommodation, complete with green technology. You enjoy guided treks and wildlife excursions by day and share evening meals with new friends, before falling asleep gazing up at the star-filled sky through your dome ceiling. Wake up in the middle of the Patagonian wilderness in a cozy geodesic dome, with a panoramic view of the majestic Torres del Paine, ready to pick up the hiking trail!EcoCamp Patagonia is a tribute to Kaweskar dwellings and way of life. The basic premise in designing the EcoCamp was to maintain the nomadic spirit of Patagonia’s ancient inhabitants. EcoCamp Patagonia is the 1st sustainable accommodation south of the Amazon, and the only one of its kind in Patagonia.

nombre: Hotel Raffaello - Sure Hotel Collection by Best Western
descripcion: Hotel Raffaello - Sure Hotel Collection by Best Western is a 3-star hotel situated in a quiet street in the Rione Monti, one of the historical quarters of the capital. From here you can reach all the monuments and places of interest within a few minutes' walk: Termini Train Station, Colosseum, The lmperial Forums, Piazza Venezia and the Basilica di Santa Maria Maggiore. There is also the Metro subway that connects to the Vatican Museums and the rest of the city. Cosy, welcoming, furnished with classic taste in shades of gold, blue and red, the rooms of the Hotel Raffaello in Rome have been devised to offer a comfortable retreat, a place to enjoy some quiet time after days spent visiting museums and shops. Hotel Raffaello - Sure Hotel Collection by Best Western offers 41 comfortable rooms equipped with flat screen satellite, minibar, free smartphone service To customize your stay, pillow menu, air-conditioning. safe, slippers and quality courtesy set. Superior suites have a beautiful private terrace overlooking the city, the ideal place to sit down and enjoy a cup of tea in a peaceful and quiet atmosphere while gazing out over the red roofs of Rome.

descripcion: Experience an Ogunquit stay, your way at The Admiral's Inn! The Admiral’s Inn is a centrally located resort-style hotel in Ogunquit offering accommodations for couples, families, and groups. Our variety of room types span between multiple buildings on 3 acres. Property amenities include two seasonal outdoor pools & hot tubs, a poolside patio bar & fire pit, complimentary breakfast, full gym & dry sauna, dog-friendly rooms, complimentary parking and WiFi. Featuring a prime location along Maine’s coastal Route One and within walking distance of town & the Marginal Way coastal walk, The Admiral’s Inn is an ideal destination when visiting Ogunquit. Within a mile are the area’s sandy beaches, whale watching at Perkin’s Cove, plentiful shopping, galleries and dining, and renowned art institutions like the Ogunquit Playhouse and Museum of American Art – all to be enjoyed along with the hospitality of the team at The Admiral’s Inn. **Pools, hot tubs & patio bar are closed for the season.**

descripcion: As the second hotel of The Hari collection - The Hari Hong Kong is located in Causeway Bay - at the heart of Hong Kong. Owned by The Harilela Group - the brand is built around the heritage of impeccable hospitality bestowed by the Harilela family- who have called Hong Kong their home for generations. A beacon of modern luxury - The Hari collection creates the best guest experience by paying attention to every detail- no matter how small. Open at the end of 2020- The Hari Hong Kong features 210 stylish rooms complete with plush velvet- bespoke wooden flooring and Italian marble bathrooms. The three luxurious suites at the top floor come with separate living rooms- private bars and terraces. Imagined by renowned British interior designer- Tara Bernerd and Partners- the hotel offers elegant rooms with an Italian and a Japanese restaurant- two bars- a large terrace- a 10-person boardroom and a fitness centre. Art runs in the DNA of the hotel- with a range of mediums displayed throughout The Hari. Lucciola serves authentic Italian dishes in a sophisticated setting- defined by a bold palette of amber and green. Zoku- the Japanese restaurant- offers a tasteful tribute to the cuisine. The ceiling of angled timber slats in origami-like forms serve as the focal point of the space. For those who enjoy the morning sun- The Terrace Bar is ideal for a relaxing breakfast or an early informal meeting. Open also for lunch and dinner- The Terrace Bar is an oasis for apres-work drinks overlooking the buzzing city.
